code: import{createSlice}from'@reduxjs/toolkit';export var loaderSlice=createSlice({name:'loader',initialState:{isOpen:false},reducers:{toggleOpen:function toggleOpen(state){if(!state.isOpen){state.isOpen=true;}},toggleOff:function toggleOff(state){if(state.isOpen){state.isOpen=false;}}}});var _loaderSlice$actions=loaderSlice.actions,toggleOpen=_loaderSlice$actions.toggleOpen,toggleOff=_loaderSlice$actions.toggleOff;export{toggleOpen,toggleOff};export default loaderSlice.reducer;export var selectLoader=function selectLoader(state){return state.loader.isOpen;};
